Small restaurant with excellent food and excellent service.  If you want to make a reservation their website has an email address and they were very responsive.  Their english is also good.  Huge wine selection.  I would simply do the 60 euro tasting menu and add the wine pairings if I could go again.  We ordered a bunch of appetizers and the paella.  All the appetizers were great, the paella however was not so good - strong burned taste to it.  But then I feel like it's on the menu only because they feel the have to.  Avoid the paella.  However everything else was so good that I feel like it deserves 5 stars despite this.  For the quality of food it's also very good value.
